Isn't this easier done with inheritance?
This is what I do:

public class ListTest {

    public abstract List getListImpl();

    ....
}

public class LinkedListTest extends ListTest {

    public List getListImpl() {
        return new LinkedList();
    }
    ....
    possibly specific tests for LinkedList
}

Another possibility would be Parameterized Tests.
Even though I think the Parameterized Syntax is sooo clunky...

Greetings
   Malte
